| -------------- | ---------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `color`        | `color`          | Color          | `"is-danger" or "is-info" or "is-primary" or "is-success" or "is-warning"` | `undefined` |
| `controlClass` | `control-class`  | Control class  | `string`                                                                   | `''`        |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`       | Disabled state | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `hasFixedSize` | `has-fixed-size` | Fixed size     | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `isLoading`    | `is-loading`     | Loading state  | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `readonly`     | `readonly`       | Readonly state | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `rows`         | `rows`           | Rows           | `number`                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `size`         | `size`           | Size           | `"is-large" or "is-medium" or "is-normal" or "is-small"`                   | `undefined` |
| `state`        | `state`          | State          | `"is-focused" or "is-hovered"`                                             | `undefined` |
| `value`        | `value`          | Value          | `number or string`                                                         | `undefined` |
